tasks.task_name: design web banners for websites
checklists: 1. Select template or create own in Figma,Photoshop
2. Customize fonts and dimensions
3. Insert CTA
4. Review design with team via Notion
5. Final adjustments and export

tasks.task_name: update web banners to new branding
checklists: 1. Load existing banner in Figma, Photoshop, Indesign
2. Update branding elements
3. Adjust dimensions and fonts
4. Internal review via Notion,
5. Export final version

tasks.task_name: create banners for social media platforms
checklists: 1. Choose or create platform-specific template in Canva, Figma, Photoshop
2. Adapt design to specified dimensions
3. Customize style and fonts
4. Get feedback via Notion
5. Prepare for publishing

tasks.task_name: refresh social media banner designs
checklists: 1. Retrieve old design from Google Drive
2. Update with new imagery using Figma, Adobe Photoshop
3. Revise text and CTA with team (rececive feedback)
4. Finalize adjustments
5. Upload to social media through CRM

tasks.task_name: develop banners for email campaigns
checklists: 1. Start with a draft in Fifma, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator
2. Incorporate brand-specific graphic elements
3. Optimize font and button design
4. Convert to required file format
5. Receive feedback from team and make final edits

tasks.task_name: revise email banners as necessary
checklists: 1. Open existing design in Figma, Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator
2. Modify graphic elements and font styles
3. Adjust CTA designs
4. Review design compliance with brand guidelines
5. Test in various email clients

tasks.task_name: create headers for social media
checklists: 1. Select or create relevant template in Canva/Figma/Adobe Photoshop
2. Incorporate background image and color scheme
3. Add text and CTA
4. Insert graphic elements
5. Receive feedback and make edits
6. Preview and export final version

tasks.task_name: enhance visuals of social media headers
checklists: 1. Retrieve current header from storage
2. Enhance images and graphics using Figma, Adobe Photoshop, Canva
3. Update CTAs
4. Test layout on different social platforms
5. Finalize and upload

tasks.task_name: design headers for websites
checklists: 1. Draft initial design in Figma, Adobe Photoshop
2. Select high-resolution images
3. Integrate brand colors and icons
4. Arrange navigation and CTA buttons
5. Review with web design team
6.Preview and export final version

tasks.task_name: improve visuals of website headers
checklists: 1. Analyze current header design
2. Apply advanced graphic enhancements in Figma, Adobe Photoshop
3. Update text and CTAs
4. Optimize for responsive design
5. Obtain final approval from design lead
6. Preview and export final version

tasks.task_name: develop outline icons
checklists: 1. Draft initial concept in Figma, Adobe Illustrator or upload on Flaticons, Iconfinder, Icons8
2. Generate icons with the help of GPT chat,
3. Focus on minimalistic design
4. Ensure visual clarity
5. Refine edges and lines
6. Final review and adjustments

tasks.task_name: standardize designs for outline icons
checklists: 1. Create a template in Adobe Illustrator or find on Flaticons, Iconfinder, Icons8
2. Define style guides for minimalism and clarity
3. Document icon standards
4. Share guidelines with team via Notion
5. Gather feedback and refine

tasks.task_name: create filled icons
checklists: 1. Start with basic shapes in Adobe Illustrator or upload on Flaticons, Iconfinder, Icons8
2. Generate icons with the help of GPT chat
3. Apply color theory principles
4. Adjust for visual clarity
5. Iterate based on feedback
6. Finalize and export for use

tasks.task_name: standardize designs for filled icons
checklists: 1. Establish a color palette in Figma
2. Define clear design criteria
3. Create a comprehensive design manual
4. Distribute manual and conduct a training session
5. Monitor adherence and update as needed

tasks.task_name: design flat icons
checklists: 1. Sketch designs using Figma or upload on Flaticon, Iconfinder, Icons8
2. Generate icons with the help of GPT chat
3. Emphasize simplicity and flat color blocks
4. Review design for uniform clarity
5. Test icons in different sizes
6. Finalize and compile into icon set

tasks.task_name: standardize designs for flat icons
checklists: 1. Define flat design guidelines in Figma
2. Create template examples
3. Distribute templates to team via Notion
4. Collect feedback and make adjustments
5. Update and finalize guidelines

tasks.task_name: develop dimensional icons
checklists: 1. Draft 3D designs in Figma, Adobe illustrator, Adobe Photoshop
2. Generate icons with the help of GPT chat
3. Apply detailed shading and gradients
4. Review for visual depth and consistency
5. Iterate based on design feedback
6. Prepare for production use

tasks.task_name: standardize designs for dimensional icons
checklists: 1. Establish a style guide in Figma
2. Define standards for shading and gradients
3. Create sample icons and review
4. Document procedures in Notion
5. Conduct training sessions for design consistency

tasks.task_name: create emoji icons
checklists: 1. Sketch initial emoji concepts in Figma, Adobe Illustrator or upload on EmojiDB
2.Generate emoji concepts with the help of GPT chat
3.Enhance color vibrancy using Figma or Adobe Photoshop
4. Simplify details for clarity at small sizes
5. Gather team feedback
6. Finalize emoji set

tasks.task_name: standardize designs for emoji icons
checklists: 1. Develop an emoji design manual in Notion and Figma
2. Specify expressiveness and color guidelines
3. Create standard sets for review
4. Distribute manual via Notion and Google Drive
5. Hold a review session to ensure compliance

tasks.task_name: generate concepts for flat illustrations
checklists: 1. Research current trends in flat design
2. Sketch initial concepts in Figma  or upload on image stock
3. Select a color palette
4. Layout initial compositions
5. Review and refine concepts

tasks.task_name: enhance visuals of flat illustrations
checklists: 1. Review existing illustrations
2. Adjust color balance and palette in Figma
3. Refine composition elements
4. Enhance visual style for clarity
5. Final approval and adjustments

tasks.task_name: develop concepts for isometric illustrations
checklists: 1. Study isometric design principles
2. Create initial sketches using grids in Figma, Adobe Illustrator
3. Apply a consistent color palette
4. Develop detailed perspective elements
5. Gather feedback and iterate designs

tasks.task_name: improve visuals of isometric illustrations
checklists: 1. Assess current isometric illustrations
2. Update dimensions and perspective using Figm, Adobe Illustrator
3. Adjust color palette for depth perception
4. Refine details for consistency
5. Finalize for production use

tasks.task_name: create concepts for vector illustrations
checklists: 1. Define key components of style in Figma
2. Develop a unified color palette
3. Sketch initial concepts in Figma, Adobe Illustrator
4. Arrange composition elements strategically
5. Review designs with the team

tasks.task_name: enhance visuals of vector illustrations
checklists: 1. Evaluate existing vector graphics
2. Enhance color palette for visual impact
3. Refine style components for uniformity
4. Adjust composition for balance
5. Review and feedback session

tasks.task_name: generate concepts for character illustrations
checklists: 1. Brainstorm character traits and themes
2. Sketch initial designs in Figma, Adobe Illustrator
3. Refine facial expressions and clothing details
4. Choose suitable color schemes
5. Present concepts for initial feedback

tasks.task_name: improve visuals of character illustrations
checklists: 1. Review current character designs
2. Update appearances and expressions for emotional impact
3. Modify clothing and color palette for consistency
4. Get feedback through internal presentations
5. Finalize adjustments

tasks.task_name: design statistical infographics
checklists: 1. Gather data and establish graph types
2. Create draft layouts in Figma, Adobe Illustrator
3. Implement color schemes for clarity and impact
4. Insert text elements and legends
5. Review and iterate based on feedback

tasks.task_name: revise statistical infographics
checklists: 1. Collect feedback on existing infographics
2. Update charts and graphs for accuracy
3. Adjust color and text for better readability
4. Reformat legends for clarity
5. Conduct final reviews and adjustments

tasks.task_name: create informational infographics
checklists: 1. Define the infographic's main message
2. Design a compelling title and header in Figma, Adobe Illustrator
3. Integrate text and visual elements for clarity
4. Review layout for visual flow
5. Refine and prepare for publication

tasks.task_name: revise informational infographics
checklists: 1. Assess feedback on existing infographic
2. Revise title and header for impact
3. Adjust text and visuals for improved clarity
4. Test different layouts
5. Final adjustments and approvals

tasks.task_name: design process infographics
checklists: 1. Outline the process steps clearly
2. Design engaging title and step descriptions in Adobe Illustrator, Figma
3. Create or select appropriate icons and symbols
4. Assemble steps in a logical flow
5. Review and iterate design for clarity

tasks.task_name: revise process infographics
checklists: 1. Gather user feedback on clarity and effectiveness
2. Update title and steps for better understanding
3. Refine icons and symbols for uniformity
4. Reevaluate the visual and textual flow
5. Implement final changes and verify

tasks.task_name: develop wordmark logos with custom typography
checklists: 1. Research and select a unique typographic style
2. Sketch initial logo concepts focusing on lettering
3. Refine typography and color palette in Adobe Illustrator
4. Present initial drafts for feedback
5. Finalize and standardize the logo design

tasks.task_name: refine wordmark logos for updated branding
checklists: 1. Review existing logo design
2. Update typography to align with new branding in Adobe Illustrator
3. Adjust color scheme for consistency
4. Simplify design to enhance readability
5. Present refined logo for feedback

tasks.task_name: create lettermark logos from initials
checklists: 1. Select appropriate font style in Adobe Illustrator
2. Design initial-based logo
3. Integrate a simple icon or symbol
4. Refine for visual balance
5. Review and iterate based on feedback

tasks.task_name: enhance lettermark logos for better recognition
checklists: 1. Evaluate current logo effectiveness
2. Enhance icon or symbol for clarity in Adobe Illustrator, Figma
3. Adjust font style for better legibility
4. Test logo in various formats
5. Finalize and implement changes

tasks.task_name: design logos with symbolic imagery
checklists: 1. Brainstorm unique imagery concepts
2. Sketch preliminary designs in Adobe Illustrator, Figma
3. Select and refine the most appropriate image
4. Simplify design for broader application
5. Finalize design and review

tasks.task_name: update pictorial logos to match brand changes
checklists: 1. Assess current logo against brand evolution
2. Redesign imagery to reflect updated brand in Adobe Illustrator, Figma
3. Simplify imagery for universal recognition
4. Test updated logo across media
5. Roll out updated logo

tasks.task_name: craft abstract logos that represent brand values
checklists: 1. Define brand values and translate into visual elements
2. Experiment with shapes and colors in Adobe Illustrator, Figma
3. Create a simple yet meaningful design
4. Review and refine the concept
5. Finalize design after feedback

tasks.task_name: adjust abstract logos for clear messaging
checklists: 1. Analyze current logo for message clarity
2. Simplify and adjust shapes and colors in Adobe Illustrator
3. Test logo perception internally
4. Refine based on feedback
5. Implement the refined logo

tasks.task_name: create logos that combine text and symbols
checklists: 1. Sketch potential designs combining text and symbols
2. Select appropriate fonts and symbols in Adobe Illustrator, Figma
3. Integrate color palette for harmony
4. Review design with stakeholders
5. Refine and finalize

tasks.task_name: revise combination logos for visual impact
checklists: 1. Evaluate existing logo's visual impact
2. Enhance font style and symbol integration in Adobe Illustrator, Figma

2. Develop icon and typography that reflect ethos in Adobe Illustrator, Figma

4. Review with the branding team

tasks.task_name: modernize emblem logos while maintaining heritage
checklists: 1. Review historical elements of the emblem
2. Incorporate modern design trends in Adobe Illustrator, Figma
3. Retain key symbols and colors

tasks.task_name: design informative presentations with clear data
checklists: 1. Define the main data points and structure
2. Design slides with clear sectioning in Microsoft PowerPoint
3. Integrate visual data representations
4. Refine content flow
5. Review for clarity and accuracy

tasks.task_name: animate elements in informative presentations
checklists: 1. Select key elements to animate for emphasis
2. Use PowerPoint animations to enhance message delivery
3. Sync animations with presentation timing
4. Test playback for smooth transitions
5. Finalize animations

tasks.task_name: create persuasive presentations to influence viewers
checklists: 1. Craft a compelling opening statement
2. Organize slides to build the argument with evidence in Microsoft PowerPoint
3. Design visual aids to support the thesis
4. Ensure logical flow of arguments
5. Practice delivery for impact

tasks.task_name: animate elements in persuasive presentations
checklists: 1. Highlight key arguments with dynamic animations
2. Apply smooth transitions to maintain audience focus
3. Align animations with speech for emphasis
4. Review animations for timing and impact
5. Adjust based on feedback

tasks.task_name: design demonstrative presentations to show processes
checklists: 1. Outline the process clearly in the introduction
2. Design slides with strong visual appeal using Adobe Illustrator, Figma for graphic elements or a template
3. Develop clear and concise commentary
4. Sequence slides for logical process flow
5. Review and practice delivery of presentation

tasks.task_name: animate elements in demonstrative presentations
checklists: 1. Identify key visuals for animation to enhance understanding
2. Use PowerPoint to implement animations
3. Sync animations with commentary for clarity
4. Test animations with a small audience for feedback
5. Refine animations based on feedback

tasks.task_name: create corporate brandbooks for brand consistency
checklists: 1. Define and document the digital UI standards in Figma
2. Include guidelines for font accessibility
3. Standardize image alternative text procedures
4. Ensure consistency across all platforms
5. Compile and review the brandbook

tasks.task_name: develop product brandbooks to outline specific product branding
checklists: 1. Establish content structure and UI design principles
2. Document accessibility standards and features
3. Align branding with overall product strategy

tasks.task_name: design visual identity guidelines to standardize visual assets
checklists: 1. Standardize logo placement and usage rules in Figma, Adobe illustrator
2. Define the color palette and typography guidelines

4. Compile guidelines into a cohesive document
5. Review and distribute the guidelines

tasks.task_name: select web fonts for online readability
checklists: 1. Research fonts suited for web readability
2. Test font rendering on various screens
3. Check licensing for web use
4. Implement fonts on a trial website
5. Gather user feedback on readability

tasks.task_name: customize web fonts for specific web needs
checklists: 1. Identify specific needs for web usage
2. Test fonts in different web environments

tasks.task_name: choose display fonts for impact in large sizes

2. Test fonts for impact and visibility at large sizes

checklists: 1. Draft initial font designs based on brand identity
2. Refine designs for readability and technical usability

5. Finalize design and print

tasks.task_name: create promo thumbnails to attract viewers

2. Design title text overlay for impact
3. Integrate branding elements consistently
4. Focus on emotive content
5. Review and adjust for visual appeal

tasks.task_name: optimize promo thumbnails for different platforms
checklists: 1. Adapt thumbnail size and layout for specific platforms

tasks.task_name: design interview thumbnails to feature participants
checklists: 1. Choose images that clearly feature participants
2. Create text overlays that are easy to read

tasks.task_name: optimize interview thumbnails for viewer engagement
checklists: 1. Review thumbnail impact on different platforms
2. Enhance visual elements for engagement
3. Standardize text and brand features

tasks.task_name: create tutorial thumbnails to summarize content
checklists: 1. Select high-quality images that represent the content
2. Design with consistent backgrounds for brand alignment

5. Gather feedback and refine

tasks.task_name: optimize tutorial thumbnails for clarity and appeal
checklists: 1. Evaluate existing thumbnails for clarity

4. Enhance overall design appeal
5. Test and revise based on analytics

tasks.task_name: generate website mockups for project previews
checklists: 1. Sketch initial layout concepts

3. Ensure responsive design principles

tasks.task_name: test website mockup usability with users
checklists: 1. Conduct user testing sessions
2. Collect qualitative and quantitative feedback
3. Analyze usability data
4. Make adjustments based on feedback

tasks.task_name: create app mockups for development planning
checklists: 1. Define core functionality and CTA placement
2. Create layout integrating navigation and typography in Sketch
3. Apply responsive design adjustments
4. Prototype interactions in Sketch

tasks.task_name: test app mockup usability for user feedback
checklists: 1. Setup usability testing with target users
2. Gather feedback on layout, navigation, and CTA effectiveness
3. Adjust design based on user interactions
4. Implement changes for enhanced usability
5. Retest and finalize design

tasks.task_name: design advertising mockups for campaigns
checklists: 1. Conceptualize Ad based on campaign goals
2. Integrate headline, images, and brand identity in Figma
3. Layout design for different media formats
4. Get preliminary feedback from marketing team
5. Refine based on feedback

tasks.task_name: test advertising mockup effectiveness
checklists: 1. Test different versions in focus groups
2. Analyze effectiveness of headline and visuals
3. Collect feedback on brand consistency
4. Tweak designs based on feedback
5. Conduct A/B testing to finalize the Ad

tasks.task_name: design promotional email templates for marketing
checklists: 1. Draft a captivating subject line and header
2. Design a compelling hero image in Figma,Adobe Photoshop
3. Develop engaging body content
4. Integrate a clear CTA

tasks.task_name: personalize promotional templates for target audiences
checklists: 1. Customize the header and subject line for audience segments
2. Adapt the hero image to reflect target demographics
3. Tailor content and CTA to audience interests
4. Ensure social links are relevant

tasks.task_name: create newsletter templates for regular updates
checklists: 1. Create an eye-catching header and title/banner
2. Write an engaging introduction section
3. Compile relevant body content
4. Design a visible CTA

tasks.task_name: tailor newsletter templates to reader preferences
checklists: 1. Adjust the header and title to suit reader preferences
2. Personalize the introduction for engagement
3. Customize body content based on past interactions
4. Vary the CTA based on user data
5. Update the footer with personalized links

tasks.task_name: design feedback email templates for user engagement
checklists: 1. Formulate an inviting subject line
2. Create a personalized greeting using dynamic content
3. Lay out clear and concise instructions
4. Design an easy-to-spot CTA
5. Include essential contact information

tasks.task_name: customize feedback templates to enhance response rates
checklists: 1. Tailor subject lines to increase open rates
2. Adjust greetings for individualization
3. Refine instructions for clarity
4. Optimize the CTA for better engagement
5. Personalize contact info based on user data

tasks.task_name: sketch mascots for brand representation
checklists: 1. Define the brand values to be represented
2. Develop character concepts reflecting these traits
3. Create preliminary sketches in Figma,Adobe Illustrator
4. Refine sketches to enhance personality
5. Finalize and review with stakeholders

tasks.task_name: sketch user avatars for online platforms
checklists: 1. Research current trends in avatar design
2. Sketch initial designs focusing on key features
3. Select appropriate color schemes
4. Incorporate interactive capabilities
5. Iterate based on user feedback

tasks.task_name: sketch instructional characters for educational content
checklists: 1. Identify educational goals
2. Design characters that are approachable and engaging
3. Create sketches with clear, inviting expressions
4. Test character appeal in focus groups
5. Adjust based on educational feedback

tasks.task_name: sketch storytelling characters for narratives
checklists: 1. Outline the narrative and character role
2. Develop characters with distinct backgrounds and emotions
3. Sketch detailed expressions and attire
4. Review narrative integration
5. Refine for emotional depth and clarity

tasks.task_name: sketch iconic characters for major branding initiatives
checklists: 1. Understand brand & target audience values, message, appeal.
2. Sketch character concepts, broad appeal, unique traits.
3. Refine based on feedback recognizability, audience connection.
4. Finalize detailed, dynamic character sketch..
5. Present for final approval and implementation.

tasks.task_name: generate digital portraits for clients
checklists: 1. Consult client for specific requirements and obtain the prompt, reference, and exclusion parameters.
2. Use the reference to guide the initial portrait design, avoiding elements listed in the exclusion parameter.
3. Apply face-swap techniques if required.
4. Perform detailed retouching post face-swap to enhance realism.
5. Create a backgroundless version of the portrait in Figma, ensuring clean edges and professional finish.
6. Convert the portrait to required formats and sizes as specified in the prompt, preparing for client review and feedback.

tasks.task_name: edit digital portraits to enhance details
checklists: 1. Review the initial prompt and reference images to understand the desired outcome.
2. Apply face-swap techniques as required and check alignment and blending.
3. Perform detailed retouching focusing on skin, eyes, and other facial features for realism.
4. Remove the background using Figma for a clean, distraction-free portrait.
5. Convert the portrait to the specified formats and prepare versions like the embroidered shirt edition if needed.
